title: Will They, Won't They?
description: Book # 2 in the Summerhouse SeriesWhen Kian walked into that summerhouse, and consequently, into Amiira's life, the immediate pull towards him threw her off kilter. Their instant connection was the last thing she had expected and she knows she isn't in the correct place emotionally to pursue anything with her gorgeous housemate.Wounds that her ex left her with are still fresh and weekend getaways had been planned as a method of solace. But will the newfound chemistry between her and the enthralling man whom she shares a house with be too much to ignore? Will the drama that her ex brought into their relationship haunt her? Will the residual feelings that still linger blind her? Or will the newness of Kian serve as a worthwhile distraction?This is the continuation of "An Involuntary Spark" which follows Amiira Barnes on her whirlwind of a summer and everything that it entails.
author: V.C. Archerly
